message.itemhand.take: Take the Region Marker into your hand first!
message.itemhand.choose: Mark a valid area with the Region Marker first!
message.regionmarker.setY: Set default Y expansion levels to %s - %s!
help.regionmarker.simple.1: Used to mark a new region.
help.regionmarker.simple.2: Keep the Region Marker in your hand while defining a region!
help.regionmarker.optional.1: 3. [Optional] Expand the region from Y 0 to 255 with the "/wp expand vert " command or by holding the right mouse button
help.regionmarker.detail.1:
A region is marked by two blocks.
The Region Marker toggles between the 1st and 2nd block after clicking.
help.regionmarker.detail.2:
1. Left-click on the 1st block to start marking a region.
2. Left-click on the 2nd block to finish marking a region.
help.regionmarker.detail.3: 4. Define the region with the "/wp region define <name>" command or by renaming the Region Marker in an anvil.
help.regionmarker.detail.4: Keep the Region Marker in your hand while defining a region!
message.flags.container.noflags: Container does not contain any name tags!
message.flags.container.novalidflags: Container does not contain any name tags with valid flags!
message.region.define.denied: You are not allowed to create regions!
message.region.priority: Priority must be in the range 1-9
message.region.errorplayer: Player '%s' is already defined in region '%s'!
message.region.unknownplayer: Player '%s' was not defined in region '%s!
message.region.addplayer: Player '%s' has been added to region '%s'!
message.player.regionremoved: You have been removed from region '%s'
message.player.regionadded: You have been added to region '%s'
help.wp.2: /wp expand vert: Expands marked region in Y level.
help.wp.3: /wp flag [...]: Commands to manipulate flags (rules) for regions.
help.wp.4: Type /wp <command> help for more details about the corresponding command.
help.region.1: /wp region define <name>: Defines a previously marked region
help.region.2: /wp region redefine <name>: Redefines the existing region
help.region.5: /wp region setpriority <name> <priority>: Set priority of region (1-9)
help.region.6: /wp region getpriority <name>: Get priority of region
help.region.8: /wp region addplayer <region> <name>: Adds the player to the region
help.region.9: /wp region removeplayer <region> <name>: Removes the player to the region
help.flags.1: /wp flag add <name> <flag> : Adds the flag to the region
help.flags.2: /wp flag remove <name> <flag> : Removes the flag from the region
help.flags.3: /wp flag list: List all flags of the region
help.flags.4: /wp flag info <name>: Get all flags of the region
help.expand.1: /wp expand vert [<Y1>] [<Y2>]: Expands region from Y1 to Y2 (default: 0 to 255).
help.expand.2: /wp expand y-default <Y1> <Y2>: Sets the Y values for the default region expansion.
